name: L3 Technologies Inc
title: CORRECTED (OFFICIAL)-U.S. approves sale of 'smart bomb' kits to Turkey

content: WASHINGTON U.S. government contractor L-3 Communications Holdings Inc has agreed to pay $4.63 million to resolve allegations that it overbilled the government for time spent by independent contractors at two U.S. bases before overseas deployments  the U.S. Justice Department said Monday.
name: L3 Technologies Inc
title: U.S. government contractor L-3 to pay $4.63 million to settle charges it overbilled

content: WASHINGTON  May 13 Dish Network Corp  Cogent Communications Holdings Inc and advocacy groups are asking U.S. regulators to restrict AT&T Inc's power over online video and other content as part of its proposed purchase of DirecTV.
name: L3 Technologies Inc
title: Dish  Cogent specify demands for concessions in AT&T-DirecTV merger
